fields.title: Heightmap
fields.description: Defines the heightmap filter for initial entity placement during chunk loading.

fields.title: Spawn Obion Predicate
fields.description: Checks for obstructions that might prevent entity spawning.

fields.title: Spawn Predicate
fields.description: Determines if an entity is valid to spawn based on specific conditions.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: Specifies the environment where the entity can spawn (e.g., on ground, in water, etc.).
